original_title: Into The Light : A Trip Through Baltimore Ballroom
overview: A not-so-Cinderella-story of LGBTQ+ Baltimore Ballroom dancers as they prepare to compete at the inagural Peabody Ball, while they face real life obstacles and cultural exploitation. This Ball takes a scene that has historically thrived underground—but has recently found itself nomadic due to a rash of gay club closings—and inserts it into one of Baltimore’s most stunning and exclusive settings.
title: Into The Light : A Trip Through Baltimore Ballroom
